page.title: 19Fordton Mill.
page.content: Fordton Mill is a very small place. It is 28 years old, the mill is on top of a river, the river Yeo. The buildings in the mill are mostly made of brick. In the mill the barley, wheat and vitamins go in to the big tanks, then it gets ground and comes out in the weight that you want it to. The owner of the mill is Mr Gulley. He has lived at the mill for 20 years. The mill produces food for Pigs, Cows, Poultry, Lambs, Calves, Horses and Dairy uses. The ingriedients for raw products are Fish neckter, barley, wheat,molaun, maize, gluten, bone meal and soya. The milk quota has an effect on the mill. They had to change grassfeed and dairyfeed and this has effected the animals health.
